title: What to do with teammates like this?
body:
This is what i get in ranked games at plat 4, my mmr is 70 above average, and the cait just wont dodge janna's typhoons for what ever reason idk.
they all called their lane 1st, so as to not cause conflict i took the role no1 wanted, support. No amount of positive thinking, situation control could make up for the apparent large gap between my teammates skills and the enemy team, so i need some advice here.
